name: Indus Net Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
tagline: Technology served with Passion, Commitment & Care
description:
Indus Net Technologies is an award-winning, global digital service company. We develop Mobile Apps, Mobile Games, IoT/Wearable Apps, and VR/AR Apps. We work on the entire application stack -i.e. backend with API, App and Frontend.
Our App development service is backed with business-centric consultancy and unmatched support. Clients include Ageas, Santander, Konvergence, Tesco, CashPoint, HelloGroup, Saudi Broadcasting, Bank of America, Mattel, Bridgestone, Government of India, etc.We are ISO 9001, ISO 27001 certified and appraised for CMMi Level3. We are known for our agility, partner approach, innovation and technology excellence.We operate from UK, USA, Saudi Arabia, Singapore and India.
READ MORE...
